title: problem
body: riot plz why i dont get box never i all times get keys plz solution with all my champ

replies.body:
I took a look at your account, and based on the champion masteries, it doesn't look like you play a huge pool of champions. Since you can only earn a single chest on each champion per season, you may need to play different champions and earn S-ranks on them to get more chests. Check out our [Hextech Crafting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for more information.

Let me know if you have any questions.
